projects.title: Prism
projects.description: Yearlong captstone project. Creates data-driven, interactive music visualizations from Spotify API data.

projects.title: unsize.
projects.description: Scout studio project. Worked with unsize, a startup changing the way people shop online. Made a marketing site, updated brand identity, and video assets on how to use their product.

projects.title: Scout Site
projects.description: A brand refresh and site redesign for Northeastern’s student-led design studio.

projects.title: Hello LA
projects.description: A local’s guide to Los Angeles. This hackathon project won best user experience at hack@brown 2016!

projects.title: React Portfolio
projects.description: The second iteration of my portfolio site. Written in React, this version built my confidence in frameworks and typescript.

projects.title: Scout: Client Spotlight
projects.description: I spent a semester on Scout’s marketing team, making motion graphics and short videos for social. This series highlights the four studio teams and what they worked on that semester.

projects.title: 50 Years: Ed and Laureen
projects.description: As one of my first documentary efforts, on my grandparent's  50th wedding anniverary I sat down with them and captured their story.

projects.title: This is Boston.
projects.description: When I started school in Boston I fell in love immediately. Soon after I went out and captured the energy and feel of the city.
